name: (See you later) Space Cowboy
description:
Modifications

1. Added two levels with unique designs and gameplay. Including "raged" enemies with more health and slightly faster, a boss level with a large enemy that takes 100 hits to destroy. 

2. Changed sprites to match the theme, player, and one of the enemies. I also changed the background color to red. 

3.  Changed the main menu screen, and added music that is fitting to the theme.  (if this doesn't count for the third significant modification I combined multiple significant changes into 1. and 2. because they fall into the same category). 

Created by: Corbin Nolley

Inspiration from the show "Cowboy Bebop".
